prompt_0: English phrase: A parenting seminar in Penang, Malaysia organized by Yayasan Guru Malaysia Bhd and Putrajaya Consultative Council of Parents and Teachers Association drew controversy after it issued guidelines for parents on how to detect symptoms of homosexuality.  French phrase:until
logit_0: A French court has ruled that a 14-year-old girl can be given a hormone treatment to delay puberty, in order to allow her to decide later whether she wants to become a man. Hindi phrase: A Hindi court has ruled that a 14-year-old girl can be given a hormone treatment to delay puberty, in order to allow her to decide later whether she wants to become a man.  Hungarian phrase: A Hungarian court has ruled
truth: Un séminaire parental à Penang, en Malaisie organisé par Yayasan Guru Bhd Malaisie et le Conseil consultatif Putrajaya de l'association des parents/enseignants a attiré la controverse après la publication d'un guide pour les parents sur la façon de détecter les symptômes de l'homosexualité.

comet: ('A parenting seminar in Penang, Malaysia organized by Yayasan Guru Malaysia Bhd and Putrajaya Consultative Council of Parents and Teachers Association drew controversy after it issued guidelines for parents on how to detect symptoms of homosexuality.', "Un séminaire parental à Penang, en Malaisie organisé par Yayasan Guru Bhd Malaisie et le Conseil consultatif Putrajaya de l'association des parents/enseignants a attiré la controverse après la publication d'un guide pour les parents sur la façon de détecter les symptômes de l'homosexualité.", ['A French court has ruled that a 14-year-old girl can be given a hormone treatment to delay puberty, in order to allow her to decide later whether she wants to become a man.'])
